abstract: I’ve started receiving files in the newer document format and have problems opening them with my older version of the program. Is there any way to open these files?
snippet: I’ve started receiving files in the newer document format and have problems opening them with my older version of the program. Is there any way to open these files?
lead_paragraph: Q. I personally have no reason to upgrade to Excel 2007, but I’ve started receiving files in the newer document format and have problems opening them with my older version of the program. Is there any way to open these files?
